Curious Bolt

RP2040STM32security
European Cyber Security Challenge (ECSC) 2023

Hardware security challenges for the hardware part of the prestigious hacking championship by the European Commission. This challenge was later made available to everyone outside of the competition as the Curious Bolt Toolkit.

RP2040STM32security
European Cyber Security Challenge (ECSC) 2022

Hardware security challenges for the hardware part of the prestigious hacking championship by the European Commission.

RP2040FreeRTOSMicroPython
Sessy Home Battery

Firmware for the best selling home battery in the Netherlands.

ESP32FreeRTOS
European Cyber Security Challenge (ECSC) 2021

Hardware security challenges for the hardware part of the prestigious hacking championship by the European Commission. Hardware was repurposed for their world championship ICC 2022, with new firmware and increased challenge difficulty.

ESP32FreeRTOSMicroPython
Pixel Badge

A beautiful ESP32 development board with 256 full-colour pixel-addressable LEDs, WiFi, and Bluetooth, programmable in Python.
